name: Knight's Vow

passives.name: Sacrifice
passives.effects: While your ''Worthy'' ally is {{tt|tethered to you|1250 units, center to edge}} and you are above {{as|30% of your '''maximum''' health}}, redirect 12% of the {{tt|pre-mitigation|Damage calculated before the Worthy ally's modifiers}} {{as|physical|physical damage}} and {{as|magic|magic damage}} damage they take to you as the respective damage type. Additionally, you {{tip|heal}} for 10% of the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} dealt by your ''Worthy'' ally to champions.

active.name: Pledge
active.effects: Designate the target allied champion as being ''Worthy'', forming a {{tip|tether}} between you and them. Champions can only be designated as ''Worthy'' by one '''Knight's Vow''' at a time. You cannot be designated as ''Worthy'' by an ally's '''Knight's Vow'''.
